title: House Republicans Accidentally Released a Trove of Damning Covid Documents
description:
New documents show a scientist calling a lab leak “highly likely” — after drafting a paper claiming the opposite.

The post House Republicans Accidentally Released a Trove of Damning Covid Documents appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Campaign to Recall Oakland Reform District Attorney Gets Rolling
description:
Oakland District Attorney Pamela Price is the target of a recall campaign, joining a slew of reformist prosecutors in California and elsewhere.

The post Campaign to Recall Oakland Reform District Attorney Gets Rolling appeared first on The Intercept.

title: A Teen Slain by Police Uproots France
description:
France tries to make sense of a week of riots, after the killing of 17-year-old Nahel Merzouk at a traffic stop.

The post A Teen Slain by Police Uproots France appeared first on The Intercept.
